select count(*) from zl_questions where iid = #{infoId} and info_class = #{type} and examine = 1

select a.id,a.uid,b.nickname,b.headerimg,b.intro,a.iid,a.info_class as infoClass,a.module_type as moduleType, a.title,a.content,a.create_time as createTime,a.examine,c.id as collectId, CASE WHEN c.id IS NULL then 0 else 1 end as isCollect, CASE WHEN ca.title IS NULL then spec.`name` else ca.title end as source, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM zl_answer as aw WHERE aw.qid = a.id and aw.examine = 1 ) as answerCount from zl_questions as a left join zl_customer as b on b.id = a.uid left join zl_collection as c on c.iid = a.id and c.type = 3 and c.uid = #{userId} left join zl_specification as spec on spec.id = a.iid and a.info_class = 1 left join zl_application_case as ca on ca.id = a.iid and a.info_class = 2 where a.id = #{questionId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(a.qid) num,a.content,c.nickname,q.create_time createTime, q.content questionContent,q.info_class infoClass,IF(q.info_class=2,app.title,s.name) infoTitle,IF(q.info_class=2,app.id,s.id) id,q.title FROM (SELECT * FROM zl_answer a WHERE a.examine=1 ORDER BY a.support_nums DESC,a.id DESC) a LEFT JOIN zl_questions q ON a.qid=q.id LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON q.uid=c.id
LEFT JOIN zl_application_case app ON app.id=q.iid AND q.info_class=2 LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON s.id=q.iid AND q.info_class=1
WHERE q.examine=1 AND c.del=1 AND IF(app.id>0,app.del=1,s.del=1) GROUP BY a.qid ) temp ORDER BY temp.num DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT q.id,q.title,q.content,q.create_time createTime,q.examine,q.uid,c.nickname,IF(a.id>0,a.title,s.name) infoTitle,c.headerimg FROM zl_questions q LEFT JOIN zl_application_case a ON q.iid=a.id AND q.info_class=2 LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON q.iid=s.id AND q.info_class=1 LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON q.uid=c.id WHERE IF(a.id>0,a.del=1,s.del=1) AND c.del=1 order by q.id desc
